forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 48. North wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny. High near 59, with temperatures falling to around 57 in the afternoon. North wind around 7 mph.

weather_report:
As Midnight nears in Downtown San Francisco, the twilight casts a soft veil over the city, underscored by a blanket of clouds that have gathered in the stillness of the night. The air, crisp and refreshing, hovers around a gentle 48 degrees, with a delicate breeze whispering through the streets. Expected to give way to a partly sunny Tuesday, the day promises temperatures that will rise modestly to a pleasant 59, then retreating into the cool embrace of afternoon shadows.

For those seeking a moment of solace or a fleeting adventure, this gentle transition between night and day invites quiet wanderings. A light jacket should suffice against the crisp air, perhaps accompanied by a scarf to ward off the remnants of the night chill. This is not a day for the usual tourist hustle; instead, one might find joy in simple routines—a leisurely stroll to a local café, perhaps savoring fresh coffee while watching the world awaken or meandering through a nearby park, absorbing the pyrotechnics of light as the sun attempts to pierce through the cloud cover. Here, in the heart of the city, even the mundane holds a touch of magic, waiting to be uncovered beneath the shifting skies.
